revisionDesc.change: moved notes to external notes file and added ptrs; checked
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Reviewed date, note placement, year, editor
Fixed editor, date, and title; reviewed paragraphing
Replaced smart quotes with straight; removed external URL links.
Changed straight quotes to chararacter reference smart quotes.
Proofread with #fw and corrected based on proofreading. Added detail about marriage date of "Minnie" Van Nostrand and assigned more specific date.
Noted image cut-offs. Changed "fo" to "of" in line 6 up on page 2 to reflect MS spelling.

body.p:
i have just got your two letters this monday Monday morning one was written last thursday Thursday and the other on friday Friday why they havent haven't arrived before i cannot tell i looked for a letter saturday Saturday and wondered i dident didn't get one but as they have come its all well Jeff came here yesterday sunday Sunday he stayed to georges saturday Saturday night and came on yesterday) there was a letter awaiting him here it was from matt she has started for home will be home the first of this week she says for jeff to not shorten his visit to brooklyn Brooklyn she is quite well and can get along very well
but walt the next is mary has written to know if they can come here for a week as minne is going to be married and they want to get some things she wants me to write if its conveinent convenient to let them come she says they will get their own grub so i suppose it would be best to let them come or have an everlasting coldness between us all walter dear i dont don't like to impose on good nature but walt if you could send me the order the first of next week i would be glad as my other sons dont don't seem to think money is nessessary necessary for me to have george and loo is coming the 1 of the month

postscript.p: i havent haven't heard more mrs Hinde if she got the money
